description: Theta series of quadratic form with Gram matrix [ 2, 1, 0, 1; 1, 8, 1, -3; 0, 1, 10, 2; 1, -3, 2, 12 ].
links: John Cannon, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
N. D. Elkies, Elliptic and modular curves over finite fields and related computational issues, in AMS/IP Studies in Advanced Math., 7 (1998), 21-76, esp. p. 57.
prog: (PARI) B(x, y, z, w)=2*x^2+8*y^2+10*z^2+12*w^2+2*x*(y+w)+2*y*(z-3*w)+4*z*w; {thetaB(n, N, bx, by, bz, bw, ix, iy, iz, iw, nn)=n=2*n; bx=floor(sqrt(n)*(1+1/sqrt(6))); bz=floor(sqrt(n/7)); bw=floor(sqrt(n/6)); by=floor(sqrt(n/3));N=vector(n/2+2); for(ix=-bx, bx, for(iy=-by, by, for(iz=-bz, bz, for(iw=-bw, bw, nn=B(ix, iy, iz, iw); if (nn<=n, N[1+nn/2]++); )))); N}a=thetaB(80);(PARI) {a(n)=if(n<1, n==0, qfrep([ 2, 1, 0, 1; 1, 8, 1, -3; 0, 1, 10, 2; 1, -3, 2, 12 ], n, 1)[n]*2)} /* _Michael Somos_, Apr 02 2006 */
crossrefs: Dual lattice to that in A045867.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from Kok Seng Chua (chuaks(AT)ihpc.nus.edu.sg), Jun 22 2000
